description.narrative: Intermediate Results (IR) 3.4 Community Based StructuresCommunity-based structures (informal & formal) are mobilized to prevent violence against children and women and to demand local accountability for keeping children safe., which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Harmful Practices (Fgm/C And Child Marriage), Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: PCR3 Keep Children SafeChildren's rights to protection are respected, protected and fulfilled in all private and public spaces.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: IR 3.4 Community Based StructuresCommunity-based structures (informal & formal) are mobilized to prevent violence against children and women and to demand local accountability for keeping children safe.
Number of villages out of 253 with initiatives aimed at accelerating the abandonment process in the 3 FGM/C practicing districts in Karamoja.
